description.value: The vampire hunter gains energy resistance equal to half his level against cold and electricity. Additionally, the vampire hunterâ€™s heartbeat is undetectable. Any ability that detects or identifies the living, such as the lifesense ability, does not perceive him. At 16th level, once per day when reduced to 0 or fewer hit points while this focus is activated, the vampire hunter immediately turns gaseous (as the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{Gaseous Form}) for up to a number of rounds equal to half his level and he gains a number of temporary hit points equal to half his level. The vampire hunter can leave gaseous form at any time without losing these temporary hit points. This effect ends after these rounds have elapsed, after the vampire hunter loses the temporary hit points, or once this focus is no longer active, at which point the vampire hunter immediately becomes corporeal and loses these temporary hit points. If he has not received healing in the interim, this returns the vampire hunter to the number of hit points he had after the attack or effect that triggered this ability.
